leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 闭环科研-主动学习/贝叶斯优化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 设计→执行→更新→再设计→评测

queries: [WEB] visualizing high dimensional optimization results github

tools.name: SUMMIT
tools.one_line_profile: High-fidelity simulator for urban driving and traffic modeling
tools.detailed_description: A simulator for massive mixed traffic in urban scenarios, often used as a benchmark environment for decision-making algorithms (POMDPs) and autonomous driving research.

tools.name: MolGenBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for molecular generative models
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark platform for evaluating the real-world applicability of molecular generative models, covering tasks from de novo design to lead optimization.

tools.name: cmaes
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight CMA-ES implementation for optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing the CMA-ES (Covariance Matrix Adaptation Evolution Strategy) algorithm, widely used for black-box optimization in scientific computing.

tools.name: OpenAxiom
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for symbolic, algebraic, and numeric computations
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Computer Algebra System (CAS) providing an environment for symbolic and algebraic computation, useful for mathematical modeling and derivation in science.

tools.name: MolScore
tools.one_line_profile: Scoring function for de novo molecular design
tools.detailed_description: An automated scoring function to facilitate and standardize the evaluation of goal-directed generative models for de novo molecular design.

tools.name: GaBOtorch
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-aware Bayesian Optimization on Riemannian manifolds
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that implements Geometry-aware Bayesian Optimization (GaBO) using PyTorch, specifically designed for optimization tasks on Riemannian manifolds.

tools.name: Axon
tools.one_line_profile: ML platform for training and experimenting with VLM/VLA models in robotics
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning platform designed for training, versioning, and experimenting with Vision-Language Models (VLM) and Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models at scale, specifically for robotics applications.

tools.name: parasol-es
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization for multi-objective optimization problems
tools.detailed_description: An ES6 module providing interactive visualization capabilities specifically for analyzing results from multi-objective optimization problems, such as parallel coordinates plots.

tools.name: Bayesian-Optimization-for-Unity
tools.one_line_profile: Unity asset for human-in-the-loop Bayesian Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Unity asset that integrates BoTorch to enable Bayesian optimization within Unity environments, supporting human-in-the-loop workflows for design and parameter tuning.

tools.name: tSS-BO
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Bayesian Optimization for Analog Circuit Sizing
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Truncated Subspace Sampling Bayesian Optimization (tSS-BO) specifically designed for the task of analog circuit sizing benchmarks.

tools.name: espminer-optim
tools.one_line_profile: CLI tuner for multi-objective optimization on hardware
tools.detailed_description: A CLI-based tuning tool that performs multi-objective optimization for ESPminer hardware configurations.

tools.name: RektGBM
tools.one_line_profile: AutoML tool combining LightGBM/XGBoost with Optuna
tools.detailed_description: A model wrapper that combines LightGBM and XGBoost with hyperparameter tuning capabilities provided by Optuna, facilitating automated machine learning workflows.

tools.name: summit_xl_sim
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation packages for Summit XL robots
tools.detailed_description: Simulation environment packages for the Summit XL, Summit XL HL, and Summit-X robots, enabling virtual experimentation and testing in robotics.

tools.name: Tunny
tools.one_line_profile: Grasshopper optimization component using Optuna
tools.detailed_description: An optimization component for Grasshopper (CAD) that utilizes Optuna for hyperparameter auto-optimization, facilitating architectural and engineering design optimization.

tools.name: Vizier
tools.one_line_profile: Kernel-free notebook environment for scientific data curation
tools.detailed_description: A notebook programming environment designed for reproducible data science and curation, featuring a kernel-free architecture to manage data workflows and provenance.

tools.name: HDBO-GP
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization with Standard GPs on high dimensional benchmarks
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Bayesian Optimization using Standard Gaussian Processes, specifically targeted at high-dimensional optimization benchmarks.

tools.name: OptGBM
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of Optuna and LightGBM for AutoML
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that integrates Optuna with LightGBM to provide an AutoML solution for gradient boosting models.

tools.name: autoxgb
tools.one_line_profile: AutoML tool for XGBoost using Optuna
tools.detailed_description: An AutoML tool that automates the tuning of XGBoost models using Optuna for hyperparameter optimization.

tools.name: ProtTrans
tools.one_line_profile: State-of-the-art pretrained language models for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing state-of-the-art pretrained transformer models for protein sequence analysis, enabling tasks such as structure prediction and function annotation.

tools.name: aiaccel
tools.one_line_profile: AIST Toolkit for Accelerating Machine Learning Research
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit developed by AIST for accelerating machine learning research, focusing on hyperparameter optimization and automated experiment management.

tools.name: ReBound
tools.one_line_profile: LiDAR visualization and annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: An open-source tool for visualizing and annotating LiDAR data, designed to assist active-learning systems in autonomous vehicle research.

tools.name: vsi2tif
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for cellSens VSI microscopy images to pyramidal TIFF
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to convert Whole Slide Images (WSIs) from the proprietary Olympus cellSens VSI format to the standard pyramidal TIFF format, facilitating bioimaging data processing.

tools.name: Tartarus
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking platform for inverse molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking platform designed for realistic and practical inverse molecular design, evaluating generative models in chemistry and materials science contexts.

tools.name: atlas-unknown-constraints
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Bayesian optimization with unknown constraints
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating Bayesian optimization algorithms in scenarios involving unknown constraints, developed by the Aspuru-Guzik group.

tools.name: Olympus
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for noisy optimization and experiment planning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking framework specifically designed for noisy optimization tasks and experiment planning in materials science and chemistry.

tools.name: HPOBench
tools.one_line_profile: Library of hyperparameter optimization benchmark problems
tools.detailed_description: A collection of benchmark problems for hyperparameter optimization (HPO), providing a standardized environment for evaluating HPO algorithms.

tools.name: HPOBenchExperimentUtils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for running large-scale HPOBench experiments
tools.detailed_description: A companion library for HPOBench that provides tools and utilities to facilitate running and managing large-scale hyperparameter optimization experiments.

tools.name: SMAC3
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization package for Hyperparameter Optimization
tools.detailed_description: Sequential Model-based Algorithm Configuration (SMAC) is a versatile tool for optimizing algorithm parameters, widely used for hyperparameter optimization in machine learning and scientific simulations.

tools.name: BayesianOptimization
tools.one_line_profile: Global optimization with Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: A pure Python implementation of global optimization with Gaussian Processes, widely used for optimizing black-box functions in scientific experiments and machine learning models.

tools.name: blackboxopt
tools.one_line_profile: Common interface for blackbox optimization algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A library providing a unified interface for various blackbox optimization algorithms, including tools for parallel optimization loops, analysis, and visualization.

tools.name: goptuna
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperparameter optimization framework in Go
tools.detailed_description: A hyperparameter optimization framework for the Go programming language, inspired by Optuna, implementing algorithms like TPE (Tree-structured Parzen Estimator).

tools.name: cds.cdsclient
tools.one_line_profile: Client for querying astronomical databases (VizieR, etc.)
tools.detailed_description: A package to query large astronomical tables and databases such as Gaia, 2MASS, SDSS, and WISE via the VizieR service, maintained by CDS.

tools.name: oiffile
tools.one_line_profile: Reader for Olympus microscopy image files (OIF/OIB)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to read Olympus Image Format (OIF) and Olympus Image Binary (OIB) files, commonly used in microscopy.

tools.name: cpsat-autotune
tools.one_line_profile: Autotuner for Google OR-Tools CP-SAT solver
tools.detailed_description: A tool to automatically tune the hyperparameters of the Google OR-Tools CP-SAT solver for specific constraint programming models.

tools.name: axtreme
tools.one_line_profile: Extensions for Ax and BoTorch tailored for the RaPiD project
tools.detailed_description: A development repository providing extensions to the Ax and BoTorch libraries, specifically designed to support adaptive experimentation in the context of the RaPiD project by DNV.

tools.name: Ax
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Experimentation Platform for black-box optimization
tools.detailed_description: An accessible, general-purpose platform for understanding, managing, automating, and optimizing experiments. It provides an easy-to-use interface for Bayesian Optimization and Active Learning.

tools.name: AEPsych
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive experimentation framework for psychophysics
tools.detailed_description: A framework for adaptive experimentation in psychophysics and perception research, built on top of GPyTorch and BoTorch to enable efficient data collection and modeling.

tools.name: HiPlot
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for high-dimensional data
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight interactive visualization tool that helps researchers discover correlations and patterns in high-dimensional data, particularly useful for analyzing hyperparameter optimization experiments using parallel coordinates.

tools.name: hiplot-mlflow
tools.one_line_profile: HiPlot fetcher for MLflow experiments
tools.detailed_description: A utility library that enables the visualization of experiments logged with MLflow using the HiPlot visualization tool, facilitating the analysis of machine learning experiment results.

tools.name: Summit
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for deep learning interpretability
tools.detailed_description: An interactive visualization tool designed to scale deep learning interpretability by summarizing and visualizing activation and attribution data from neural networks.

tools.name: GeneDisco
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for active learning in drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating active learning algorithms specifically for experimental design in the context of drug discovery, providing curated datasets and evaluation metrics.

tools.name: Open Source Vizier
tools.one_line_profile: Research interface for blackbox and hyperparameter optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based research interface for blackbox and hyperparameter optimization, based on the internal Google Vizier Service, designed to manage and optimize complex experiments.

tools.name: allennlp-optuna
tools.one_line_profile: Optuna integration plugin for AllenNLP
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that adds subcommands to AllenNLP to enable easy hyperparameter optimization using the Optuna framework.

tools.name: hiplotlib
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for HiPlot visualization
tools.detailed_description: The R language infrastructure and interface for the HiPlot visualization platform, enabling R users to generate HiPlot visualizations.

tools.name: hiplot-plugins-open
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source plugins for HiPlot
tools.detailed_description: A collection of open-source plugins for the HiPlot visualization platform, extending its functionality for various data types and visualization needs.

tools.name: InterpretML
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for interpretable machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for training interpretable machine learning models and explaining blackbox systems, supporting techniques like EBM (Explainable Boosting Machine) and SHAP.

tools.name: dask-optuna
tools.one_line_profile: Extension to scale Optuna hyperparameter optimization using Dask
tools.detailed_description: A library that integrates Optuna with Dask to enable distributed hyperparameter optimization, allowing users to scale their optimization workflows across Dask clusters.

tools.name: bayeso-benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark function library for Bayesian optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing a collection of benchmark functions (synthetic landscapes) specifically designed for evaluating and comparing Bayesian optimization algorithms.

tools.name: loss-landscape-anim
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for neural network optimization trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to create 2D animations of the optimization trajectory of neural networks on loss landscapes, aiding in the analysis of training dynamics.

tools.name: BoTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization library built on PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A foundational library for Bayesian optimization research and applications, providing modular and scalable components for building optimization loops.

tools.name: grimon
tools.one_line_profile: 3D visualization tool for multi-omics data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for creating 3D graphical visualizations of multi-omics data, facilitating the exploration of high-dimensional biological datasets.

tools.name: kedro-neptune
tools.one_line_profile: Neptune experiment tracking integration for Kedro pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that integrates Neptune.ai experiment tracking with Kedro data pipelines, enabling metadata management and visualization of scientific workflows.

tools.name: neptune-client
tools.one_line_profile: Client library for Neptune experiment tracking platform
tools.detailed_description: The Python client for Neptune.ai, allowing researchers to log, organize, visualize, and compare machine learning experiments and scientific data.

tools.name: neptune-optuna
tools.one_line_profile: Neptune integration for Optuna hyperparameter optimization
tools.detailed_description: An integration library that logs Optuna hyperparameter sweeps to Neptune, providing real-time visualization and analysis of optimization runs.

tools.name: neptune-sacred
tools.one_line_profile: Neptune integration for Sacred experiment configuration
tools.detailed_description: A plugin to log experiments configured with Sacred to the Neptune platform for visualization and management.

tools.name: neptune-sklearn
tools.one_line_profile: Neptune integration for scikit-learn models
tools.detailed_description: A library to automatically log scikit-learn model metadata, metrics, and parameters to Neptune for experiment tracking.

tools.name: neptune-tensorboard
tools.one_line_profile: Integration to sync TensorBoard logs with Neptune
tools.detailed_description: A tool that allows users to upload TensorBoard logs to Neptune, combining TensorBoard's profiling with Neptune's experiment management.

tools.name: neptune-tensorflow-keras
tools.one_line_profile: Neptune integration for TensorFlow and Keras
tools.detailed_description: A callback library for Keras/TensorFlow to log training metrics and model checkpoints to Neptune.

tools.name: neptune-xgboost
tools.one_line_profile: Neptune integration for XGBoost
tools.detailed_description: A callback library for XGBoost to log training metrics, feature importance, and trees to Neptune.

tools.name: UCSCXenaShiny
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive R/Shiny tool for exploring UCSC Xena genomics data
tools.detailed_description: An R package and Shiny application designed for the interactive exploration, visualization, and analysis of multi-omics data hosted on UCSC Xena.

tools.name: hiplot-org-plugins
tools.one_line_profile: Plugin collection for Hiplot visualization platform
tools.detailed_description: A collection of open-source plugins for the Hiplot platform, extending its capabilities for scientific data visualization, particularly in bioinformatics.

tools.name: auto-tuning-vllm
tools.one_line_profile: Automated tuning workflow for vLLM using Optuna
tools.detailed_description: A toolset to optimize the performance of Large Language Model (LLM) deployments (vLLM) by automatically tuning configuration parameters using Optuna.

tools.name: Optuna
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic hyperparameter optimization software framework
tools.detailed_description: A widely used hyperparameter optimization framework that automates the search for optimal hyperparameters using efficient sampling and pruning strategies.

tools.name: Optuna Dashboard
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time web dashboard for visualizing Optuna optimization results
tools.detailed_description: A real-time web dashboard for Optuna that provides visualization of optimization history, hyperparameter importances, and other metrics to analyze hyperparameter optimization trials.

tools.name: Optuna Fast fANOVA
tools.one_line_profile: Cython-accelerated fANOVA implementation for Optuna
tools.detailed_description: A library providing a Cython-accelerated implementation of fANOVA (Functional Analysis of Variance) for Optuna, used to assess the importance of hyperparameters in optimization tasks.

tools.name: Optuna Integration
tools.one_line_profile: Integration modules for Optuna with third-party libraries
tools.detailed_description: A library containing integration modules for Optuna to work seamlessly with various third-party machine learning frameworks and libraries (e.g., PyTorch, XGBoost, LightGBM).

tools.name: AutoGBT-Alt
tools.one_line_profile: AutoML tool using LightGBM and Optuna
tools.detailed_description: An experimental Python package that reimplements AutoGBT, providing automated machine learning capabilities using LightGBM for modeling and Optuna for hyperparameter tuning.

tools.name: xfeat
tools.one_line_profile: Feature engineering and exploration library
tools.detailed_description: A flexible feature engineering and exploration library that utilizes GPUs and Optuna to automate and accelerate the feature generation and selection process for machine learning.

tools.name: Bocoel
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization for LLM evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A library that uses Bayesian Optimization as a coverage tool for evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs), enabling efficient and accurate benchmarking.

tools.name: AutoLGBM
tools.one_line_profile: Automated LightGBM training and tuning
tools.detailed_description: A tool to automatically train LightGBM models directly from CSV files, tune hyperparameters using Optuna, and serve the best model via FastAPI.

tools.name: BlackBoxOptim.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box optimization library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A global optimization library for Julia supporting various black-box optimization algorithms, suitable for optimizing expensive scientific functions.

tools.name: scikit-optimize
tools.one_line_profile: Sequential model-based optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A library for sequential model-based optimization (Bayesian optimization) with a scipy.optimize interface, widely used for hyperparameter tuning and black-box optimization.

tools.name: Trieste
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization toolbox on TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian optimization toolbox built on TensorFlow, designed for efficient optimization of expensive black-box functions in research and industrial applications.

tools.name: Sherpa
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperparameter optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for hyperparameter tuning of machine learning models, providing various optimization algorithms and visualization tools.

tools.name: SigOpt Server
tools.one_line_profile: Open source API server for SigOpt optimization platform
tools.detailed_description: The open-source version of the SigOpt API server, providing a platform for hyperparameter optimization, experiment tracking, and visualization.

tools.name: Interactive GP Visualization
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: A web-based interactive tool for visualizing Gaussian Processes, helping researchers understand GP behavior, kernels, and hyperparameters.

tools.name: Summit
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical reaction optimization toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for optimizing chemical reactions using machine learning and Bayesian optimization, providing benchmarks and algorithms specifically for chemistry.

tools.name: Six Axis Complementary Filter
tools.one_line_profile: 6-DOF complementary filter for IMU data
tools.detailed_description: A platform-independent C++ implementation of a complementary filter for processing 6-axis IMU data (accelerometer and gyroscope) to estimate orientation.

tools.name: iterate
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking and HPO tool for geospatial foundation models (TerraTorch)
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for benchmarking and hyper-parameter optimization specifically for TerraTorch (geospatial AI). It integrates MLFlow for experiment logging, Optuna for optimization, and Ray for parallelization, facilitating the evaluation of earth science models.

tools.name: highdimensional-decision-boundary-plot
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for ML classifier decision boundaries in high dimensions
tools.detailed_description: A library for estimating and plotting the decision boundaries of machine learning classifiers in higher-dimensional spaces. It aids in the evaluation and interpretation of model behavior, which is critical in scientific machine learning workflows.

tools.name: advisor
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source hyperparameter tuning system based on Google Vizier
tools.detailed_description: An open-source implementation of the Google Vizier standard for hyperparameter tuning. It serves as a black-box optimization service, supporting various algorithms for optimizing scientific experiments and machine learning models.

tools.name: bayesmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for Bayesian optimization methods
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to facilitate the benchmarking and comparison of Bayesian optimization methods on real-world machine learning tasks. It provides a standardized environment for evaluating optimization strategies used in closed-loop research.

tools.name: deepbedmap
tools.one_line_profile: Super-resolution deep learning model for Antarctic bed elevation mapping
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses deep neural networks to generate high-resolution bed elevation datasets for Antarctica (super-resolution). It serves as both a modeling tool and a data repository for glaciology and earth science research.

tools.name: optuna-distributed
tools.one_line_profile: Extension for distributed hyperparameter optimization with Optuna
tools.detailed_description: A tool that extends the Optuna framework to support distributed hyperparameter optimization, enabling scalable experiment execution for scientific machine learning and simulation tasks.

tools.name: Probabilistic-density-network
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning paradigm for inverse design of functional metastructures
tools.detailed_description: A probability-density-based deep learning framework designed for the fuzzy inverse design of functional metastructures. It addresses scientific modeling tasks in materials science and physics.

tools.name: medical-segmentation-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of medical image segmentation models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of deep learning models (UNet, UNet++, etc.) specifically implemented for medical semantic segmentation tasks. It includes workflows for training, evaluation, and optimization (Optuna integration).
